summary: This bill, the "Maintaining American Superiority by Improving Export Control Transparency Act," aims to increase transparency regarding export licenses. It amends the Export Control Reform Act of 2018 to require the Secretary to submit annual reports to congressional committees on export license applications, enforcement actions, and authorizations. The reports must include details about the applicants, items, end-users, and decisions, while also protecting certain information from public disclosure. The bill focuses on exports to entities in countries of concern, as specified in the Export Administration Regulations.
